participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and adventurous, she enjoys exploring new hobbies and watching movies.
participant_1.background: I do not own a television. I live in the mountains. I know how to pilot a plane. I am a lawyer.

participant_2.name: Josh
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and straightforward, he enjoys simple pleasures and has a love for music.
participant_2.background: I eat a lot of carbs even though my doctor tells me not to. My favorite singer is Jess Greenberg. Just this past week I got a job cleaning gutters. I ride a motorcycle, but it's not a Harley.

content.text: Hi there!
Hey!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to ride my motorcycle, clean gutters, and listen to Jess Greenberg.
That's cool. I love to ride my motorcycle too. I also like to watch movies and play video games.
What's your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is The Shawshank Redemption.
That's a great movie. I love the ending.
Me too. It's one of the most satisfying endings to a movie I've ever seen.
What video games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different games, but I'm really into open-world games right now.
I love open-world games too. I've been playing a lot of Breath of the Wild lately.
That's a great game. I've been playing a lot of Red Dead Redemption 2.
I've heard good things about that game. I'll have to check it out.
You should. It's a lot of fun.
I'm sure it is.
So, what do you do for a living?
I just started a job cleaning gutters. It's not my dream job, but it pays the bills.
I know what you mean. I'm a lawyer, but I don't love it.
What do you like about it?
I like the challenge of it. I also like the feeling of helping people.
That's great. I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks. I'm glad you enjoy yours too.
